items.name: Deep Breathing
items.notes: Seated or lying. 3 minutes of slow, deep belly breathing to begin recovery practice

items.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
items.notes: Very slow, gentle spinal waves. Follow breath rhythm

items.name: Butterfly Pose (Seated Forward Fold)
items.notes: Soles of feet together, fold forward. Release hips, groin, inner thighs

items.name: Dragon Pose (Low Lunge Yin Style)
items.notes: Each side. Deep hip flexor and quad release. Back knee down, sink into stretch

items.name: 90/90 Hip Stretch
items.notes: Each side. Front hip internal rotation, back hip external rotation. Breathe into restrictions

items.name: Figure-4 Stretch
items.notes: Each side. Lying or seated. Deep glute and hip release after basketball and lower body training

items.name: Child's Pose with Deep Breathing
items.notes: Knees wide, sink hips to heels. Arms extended or alongside body. Back and shoulder release

items.name: Supine Spinal Twist
items.notes: Each side. Lying on back, one knee across body. Gentle thoracic rotation and release

items.name: Cat-Cow to Cobra Stretch
items.notes: Slow transitions. Final gentle spinal extension and flexion

items.name: Happy Baby
items.notes: Lying on back, knees to chest, hold feet. Gentle hip and lower back release

items.name: Savasana (Corpse Pose)
items.notes: Final relaxation. Lying flat, arms at sides, palms up. Allow complete body and mind rest for 5 minutes
